about_the_game:
Galaxy City - Premium Edition contain Full game & Additional content

Additional content
1.New Many Additional Environment
2. Creatures
3.Different Skins

Studio Baby welcome you to the Universe of Galaxy City – studio most ambitious open-world game .

Galaxy City tells the story of Alien Sophie (Girl) and Niku (baby girl) and their Battle against the Red lord during the Dark Age in the Galaxy.


Key Features:


Hauntingly beautiful vistas and locations

Freedom and Liberty -Do whatever you want in a massive open world with hundreds of locations.

Elements of an RPG – Players will obtain a variety of weapon types.

Creature - Ability to ride and fly alien creatures.

Galaxy City -Explore Galaxy City



Teleportation Tower - Simple Teleportation Tower for Progress.

Story and Characters – Galaxy Citizen tells the story of Alien Sophie (girl) and Niku (baby girl).


Great Soundtrack- Game has incredible orchestral and Electronic music.

Story




Galaxy is suffering from Dark age,where life is cheap,there is no economy and culture.

Trantord - Trantord is planet where green people lives.
Terminus - Red lord has lost war at planet terminus..




Life mission - Fight against the Red lord non-senses.



Free To Play

name: Galaxy City® : Season 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or later
  • Processor: i3 1.60 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or later
  • Processor: I5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

oflc.descriptors:
Parental guidance
Mild Themes
Scary Scenes

short_description: You are Alien fight against the Red lord.Galaxy City is an online Action Game set in a Alien world.Free To Play
